author: JMeneses
title: Good location and great value for a short visit to Paris
text:
The hotel is walking distance to the Cite Universite and Parc Montsouris. You have several transport options close by. In about 20 minutes metro ride you are in the centre; but you can relax away from the tourist areas an feel more like a local in the hotel surroundings.
The room is on the small side of things but more than perfect for a few days. It has on-suite facilities, tv, safe, phone. It was a surprise the fact that the hotel lends you free of charge a smart mobile phone with unlimited local and international phone calls and internet access at not extra cost at all.
The breakfast was actually quiet nice with a variety of things available. Well worth having it included on your hotel fare.
The staff was very polite.
